titleStmt.title: A call from Heaven to the unconverted A sermon preached at the f[un]eral of Mr. John Gaspine. If these weighty considerations are not worth your reading, keep it clean, and return it when calld [sic] for.

notesStmt.note: Identified as Wing C296A, reel 2328, of the UMI microfilm set, "Early English books, 1641-1700".
Date of publication from Wing C296A.
Cf. Wing C296A which has "J. Williams" in the imprint.
Reproduction of original in Dr. Williams' Library, London, England.
